source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_SEQ_00<tab>Alphinaud is minded to share his account of the events that unfolded in Paglth'an with the sultana.
target: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_SEQ_00<tab>ウルダハ・ランディングのアルフィノは、パガルザンでの戦果を報告に向かいたいようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_SEQ_01<tab>Upon disembarking at the airship landing, you are met by Nanamo, who reveals that one of your friends has been gravely wounded. Realizing at once that she must mean Arenvald, Alphinaud departs for the Phrontistery in visible distress, prompting Alisaie to suggest that you and Estinien go after him.
target: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_SEQ_01<tab>ナナモが現れ、アレンヴァルドの負傷を伝えられた。ウルダハのフロンデール歩廊で「薬学院の治癒師」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_SEQ_02<tab>At the Phrontistery, you are told that the chirurgeons have done all they can for your comrade, but that his fate yet hangs in the balance. When Alphinaud subsequently thanks Fordola for bringing Arenvald back, she lashes out at him, condemning his idealism as naivety. At this, Estinien interjects that those who uphold such ideals are the ones remembered as heroes. Alas, his words seem to fall on deaf ears.
target: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_SEQ_02<tab>アレンヴァルドの容態を聞いた。フォルドラは、悔やむアルフィノの考えを否定し去っていった。フロンデール歩廊の「アルフィノ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_SEQ_03<tab>At the sultana's invitation, you join the rest of the Scions in the Fragrant Chamber, hoping to hear the findings of Arenvald and Fordola's ill-fated mission. You duly learn that a creature resembling Ifrit was waiting for them inside the tower, and that further such entities have been sighted in the vicinity of other towers across the realm. Anticipating your response to these grim tidings, Nanamo assures you that the Grand Companies are ready to deal with the threat, and bids you take the opportunity to recuperate from your recent exertions.
target: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_SEQ_03<tab>香煙の間に通され、ナナモと今後の対策について話し合った。世界各地に「異形の蛮神」が出現しているらしい。ウルダハのロイヤル・プロムナードで「アリゼー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_SEQ_04<tab>Outside the Fragrant Chamber, Thancred notifies those stationed at the Rising Stones by linkpearl that your party will soon be returning. In the ensuing conversation, he learns that Krile has several matters she wishes to discuss, one of them involving Estinien.
target: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_SEQ_04<tab>クルルの要請で、エスティニアンも一緒に石の家に戻ることになった。モードゥナのレヴナンツトールにある「石の家」に向かおう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_SEQ_05<tab>Scant moments after welcoming you home, Krile announces her intention to depart for Sharlayan to petition the Forum's aid in uncovering the Telophoroi's true motives; a proposal which raises eyebrows among her fellow Archons, but one to which they ultimately acquiesce. The surprises do not end there, however. Krile also reveals that the investigation she recently conducted alongside Y'shtola concerned the apparent lack of communication between Hydaelyn and Her chosen champion─you. This, she declares, is another question to which she hopes to find answers during her trip. Acknowledging that her departure will leave the Scions a member short, however, she turns at last to Estinien, and invites him once more to join the cause. And, perhaps most surprisingly of all, he accepts.
target: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_SEQ_05<tab>シャーレアンに旅立つことを決めたクルルの頼みで、エスティニアンも「暁」に力を貸してくれることになった。石の家の「タタル」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_SEQ_06<tab>With Lunar Bahamut slain, and the Scions' ranks bolstered by the presence of a singularly capable new member, now would seem the perfect time to rest and take stock. Though Fandaniel and the Telophoroi remain a threat, you may be sure that Tataru will call upon you when the time comes to face them again.
target: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_SEQ_06<tab>「暁」の仲間たちもみな、各国との連絡や蛮神対策に動いているらしい。仲間の活動を頼りにしながら、状況に進展があるまで備えておこう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Phrontistery chirurgeon.
target: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_TODO_00<tab>薬学院の治癒師と話す

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
target: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_TODO_01<tab>アルフィノと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Alisaie.
target: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_TODO_02<tab>アリゼーと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_TODO_03<tab>Return to the Rising Stones.
target: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_TODO_03<tab>石の家に向かう

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Tataru.
target: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_TODO_04<tab>タタルと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_TODO_23<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_TODO_23<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALISAIE_000_000<tab>From what I could tell, there didn't seem to be many imperials in the vicinity of the tower. Hopefully, Arenvald and Fordola will have used the opportunity to get in and out undetected.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALISAIE_000_000遠目に見たかぎりでは、
「終末の塔」周辺で戦闘は起きていなかったけど……
アレンヴァルドとフォルドラは……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_GRAHATIA_000_005<tab>Tiamat did all she promised and more this day, but I doubt she will be satisfied. Nay, she will fight on in defense of her children, wheresoever they may be.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_GRAHATIA_000_005ティアマットはこれから、世界中の空を飛ぶんだろうな。
同胞である、メラシディアのドラゴン族を護るために。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_URIANGER_000_010<tab>Though the day is won─thanks in no small part to thy valor─the Telophoroi are far from defeated. Yet be that as it may, 'tis only right that we rejoice in Lunar Bahamut's banishment unto the aether.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_URIANGER_000_010願わくは、二度とルナバハムートが現れることがなきよう……。
此度の戦では、我らは勝利を得ることができました。
このままテロフォロイに肉薄できればよいのですが。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_YSHTOLA_000_015<tab>To see the Amalj'aa fighting alongside us brought to mind the Zun we encountered in the Crystarium. I pray that our peoples can forge bonds as strong as those of our counterparts in the First.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_YSHTOLA_000_015人とともに戦うアマルジャ族の姿は、
クリスタリウムの住人だったズン族と重なって見えたわ。
本来、ああして手を取り合える種族だったということよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_THANCRED_000_020<tab>It will take more than a single victory to wash away all the bad blood between men and Amalj'aa...but one has to start somewhere.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_THANCRED_000_020憎み合ってきた関係すべてが過去になることはない。
だが、一部とでも手を取り合うことができれば、
互いの未来を紡ぐための大きな一歩になるはずだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ESTINIEN_000_025<tab>I should have known you'd be the one to end it. Mayhap now Tiamat will find some measure of solace.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ESTINIEN_000_025……トドメは、お前たちに任せることになってしまったな。
おかげで、ティアマットの願いを叶えることができた。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_FLAMEPILOT04062_000_030<tab>Is it true? Has Lunar Bahamut been defeated?
target: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_FLAMEPILOT04062_000_030<tab>ルナバハムートの討伐、感謝いたします……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_040<tab><sigh> Standing around here worrying is not going to help matters. Come, we must discuss the day's events with Pipin and Her Grace.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_040……ここで案じていても仕方ない、やるべきことをやろうか。
ピピン殿も戻っておられるだろうから、彼と合流して、
ナナモ陛下へ報告を……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_NANAMOULNAMO_000_041<tab>(-???-)Brave Scions!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_NANAMOULNAMO_000_041(-？？？？-))) (( )) 02 /var>、アルフィノ……！
それに、「暁」の皆よ……！

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_NANAMOULNAMO_000_042<tab>Would that I could treat you to a hero's welcome─but I bear urgent news from the Phrontistery.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_NANAMOULNAMO_000_042本来なら、いの一番に参戦の礼を述べねばならぬところじゃが、
それよりも、今は急ぎフロンデール薬学院へ……！

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_043<tab>Your Grace! Whatever is the matter?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_043ナナモ陛下！？
薬学院へ……とは……いったい……？

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_NANAMOULNAMO_000_044<tab>As our troops withdrew from Paglth'an, they came upon the two scouts sent to the nearby tower. I have yet to hear a full account, but it seems that one of them─your friend, I believe─had been wounded, and was being dragged away by the other.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_NANAMOULNAMO_000_044先ほど帰還したピピンより報告が……。
撤収の際に、負傷したアレンヴァルドを抱えた、
フォルドラを発見し、保護したと！

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_045<tab>Oh no...
target: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_045<tab>…………ッ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_046<tab>I-I must go. Forgive me, Your Grace!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_046陛下、御自らのご伝達、感謝の言葉もありません。
申し訳ありませんが……失礼いたします……！

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_THANCRED_000_047<tab>Can you tell us aught of Arenvald's condition, Your Grace? The wounded scout.
target: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_THANCRED_000_047<tab>アレンヴァルドの容態をお伺いしても……？

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_NANAMOULNAMO_000_048<tab>Naught save that it is grave. The chirurgeons tend to him even as we speak.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_NANAMOULNAMO_000_048帰還後、すぐに薬学院へと運び込まれたのでな。
仔細がわかり次第、報告が来ることになっておるが……
今はただ、一刻を争う、と。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALISAIE_000_049<tab>The infirmary must be inundated with the wounded. If all of us go, we'll only get underfoot. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Estinien─would you mind going after Alphinaud? He may need some support─from someone other than me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALISAIE_000_049みんなで押しかけても、治療の邪魔になるわ。
)) (( )) 02 /var>、エスティニアン、
アルフィノの側にいてあげて……？

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ESTINIEN_000_050<tab>Very well.
target: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ESTINIEN_000_050<tab>……わかった、俺たちで薬学院へと向かおう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALISAIE_000_051<tab>Thank you. The rest of us will see that the relevant people know what took place in Paglth'an.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALISAIE_000_051お願い……。
パガルザンでのことは、私たちで報告しておくわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ESTINIEN_000_052<tab>Come on, then.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ESTINIEN_000_052……それじゃあ、相棒。
俺たちは、「フロンデール薬学院」へ行くぞ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ESTINIEN_000_060<tab>...I take it Alphinaud is fond of Arenvald.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ESTINIEN_000_060アルフィノの様子から察するに、
負傷して運び込まれたって奴とは仲が良かったんだろう？

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ESTINIEN_000_061<tab>I know how he feels. But hand-wringing isn't going to help anyone. You had better have a word.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ESTINIEN_000_061こういうときは、本気で喚いて、取り乱して……
それを仲間たちに止められるくらいがちょうどいい。
さあ、アルフィノを落ち着かせてやってくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_065<tab>Please, tell me something! <var 1A 02 /var>Anything<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_065<tab>どうか、容態だけでも……！！

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_FORDOLA_000_070<tab>Instead of standing there gawping, why don't you tell your friend to stop whining like an underfed dog? People are fighting for their lives in there.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_FORDOLA_000_070私のことよりも、あのやかましいガキをどうにかしろ。
中では、負傷者の治療が続いているんだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_FRONDALEHEALER04063_000_080<tab>Another one come to see the lad in silver armor? Master Damielliot is attending to him as we speak. If you would be so kind as to wait─
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_FRONDALEHEALER04063_000_080あっ！　あなたも、白銀の鎧のお方を？
彼は、ダミエリオー先生が診ておられますので、
今はここでお待ちください！

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_081<tab>What did Master Damielliot say? Tell me his exact words!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_081だが、容態だけでもお聞かせ願えないだろうか？
彼は私の大切な仲間で……友人なんだ……！

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_Q1_000_100<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_Q1_000_100<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_A1_000_100<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Enough<var 1A 01 /var>, Alphinaud. This isn't helping.
target: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_A1_000_100<tab>気持ちはわかるが、落ち着け

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_A2_000_100<tab>Let the chirurgeons do their work.
target: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_A2_000_100<tab>治療が終わるのを待とう

source:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_085But─ ...You're right. Forgive me.
...When we said our farewells to Arenvald, I was afraid that something like this might happen, but now that it has...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_085……そうだね……すまない、私としたことが。
決して邪魔にならないようにするから、
このまま、ここにいさせてくれ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_086<tab>...All we can do is wait.
target: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_086<tab>…………治療が終わるのを、待とう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ESTINIEN_000_100<tab>That woman... She plays at scorn, but her eyes are filled with sorrow. Sorrow deep enough to drown in.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ESTINIEN_000_100あの目つきが悪い女……
あいつも、かなりの辛酸を嘗めてきたんだろう？
愛する者を奪われ、誰かを恨んだことがある……そんな目だ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_121<tab>I know... I know. There is nothing more I can do here. Come, let us rejoin the others.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_121……ここで、立ち尽くしていても仕方ないね。
報告も任せきりになってしまったし、皆と合流しなければ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_FLAMEHERALD04063_000_122<tab>Ahem. Her Grace invites the Scions of the Seventh Dawn to join her in the Fragrant Chamber.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_FLAMEHERALD04063_000_122「暁」の方々ですね？
ナナモ陛下が、香煙の間でお待ちしております。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_FLAMEHERALD04063_000_123<tab>Your comrades have already arrived. Will the three of you be joining them?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_FLAMEHERALD04063_000_123お仲間の皆様にも、すでにお集まりいただいております。
どうか、お三方もご移動いただけますでしょうか？

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_124<tab>We will.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_124ええ、もちろんです。
すぐに向かいましょう……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_150<tab>Though we have won our first battle against the Telophoroi, and made significant discoveries to boot, the war has scarcely begun. We must steel ourselves for what lies ahead.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_150戦いには勝った、新たな情報も得られた。
だが、やはりそれだけでは……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_GRAHATIA_000_155<tab>Alphinaud knows only too well that sacrifices are an unavoidable part of conflict.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_GRAHATIA_000_155……戦いとなれば、犠牲が出ることもある。
そんな現実は、アルフィノだって承知の上だろうが、
理屈と想いは別のものだからな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_GRAHATIA_000_156<tab>But knowing something does not change how one feels about it. You yourself have shared adventures with Arenvald, have you not? ...Then I shall say no more.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_GRAHATIA_000_156あんたも、アレンヴァルドとアルフィノを連れて、
アラミゴの財宝探しに行ったりしたんだろ？
だったら余計に……うん……無理だけはしないでくれよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_URIANGER_000_160<tab>With the secrets of the towers thus laid bare, our duty to prevent further abductions taketh on new import. Fail in this and our enemy shall punish our negligence with a plague of primals.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_URIANGER_000_160異形の蛮神を召喚するカラクリは明かされました。
しかし、誘拐事件そのものを防がねば、
相手は今後も、蛮神を手駒としてくるでしょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_YSHTOLA_000_165<tab>Amidst this great push for peace with the beast tribes, we would do well to remember that old prejudices yet remain. It is a delicate political dance, and I do not envy the sultana her task─nor any Alliance leader.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_YSHTOLA_000_165国内の反蛮族勢力を抑え込みつつ、蛮神対策を行うなんて。
ナナモ陛下の推し進める道には、かなりの困難が待つはずよ。
本当に、頭が下がる思いだわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_THANCRED_000_170<tab>Even without the threat of tempering to contend with, the Grand Companies have quite a task on their hands.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_THANCRED_000_170テンパードを生み出すためのエーテル放射をしないとしても、
グランドカンパニーで異形の蛮神に対抗するのは、
かなりの難題のはず……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_THANCRED_000_171<tab>Regardless of Her Grace's protestations to the contrary, it may be best to dispatch a few of our own to assist in the endeavor. Remind me to mention it to Tataru, would you?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_THANCRED_000_171「暁」からも、石の家で待機中の手練れたちを、
各国へまわしてやった方がいいかもしれないな。
さっそく相談してみるとするか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ESTINIEN_000_175<tab>If there is no reason to linger, I will take my leave.
target: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ESTINIEN_000_175<tab>さて、俺は今後、何をすべきか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALISAIE_000_200<tab>Right, then. Unless anyone has any objections, I think it's about time we returned to the Rising Stones.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALISAIE_000_200戦いは終わったわ……。
私たちも石の家に戻りましょう？

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALISAIE_000_201<tab>And that includes you, Alphinaud. Arenvald is in good hands here.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALISAIE_000_201アルフィノも……。
絶対、なんて言葉はとても使えないけれど、薬学院には、
エオルゼア随一の治癒師や錬金術師がいるわ……だから……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_202<tab>...Of course. He would doubtless mock me for pacing about the infirmary.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_202ああ、わかっているよ……。
悲しむにはまだ早い、ここに立ち尽くしていては、
それこそ、アレンヴァルドに怒られてしまう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_203<tab>Let us retire, then, that we might regain our strength in readiness for the coming challenges.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_203……後悔や反省も、立ち止まったままでは何も生み出さない。
今は、できることをするべきだ。
行動し続けるためにも、石の家に戻ろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_THANCRED_000_204<tab>If all are in agreement, then, I shall let Krile know to expect us. A hot bath and a hearty meal shouldn't be beyond arranging with the time available.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_THANCRED_000_204それなら、クルルに通信を入れておこう。
熱い湯とメシの用意くらいは、頼めるかもしれん。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_205<tab>It will be good to be home. I have some thinking to do...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_205たとえ、甘い考えだろうと……
私は、犠牲を少しでも減らすために……。

source:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_THANCRED_000_206Yes, I'll try asking him.
...And thank you, I shall look forward to it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_THANCRED_000_206……ああ、まだ一緒にいるから、声をかけてみよう。
それじゃあ、石の家で。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_THANCRED_000_207<tab>Our comrades eagerly await our return. And Krile, in particular, has a few matters she is keen to discuss─one of which concerns <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>, Estinien, believe it or not. You <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> join us, won't you?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_THANCRED_000_207どうやら、クルルも俺たちに話があるらしい。
それと……エスティニアンにも、な。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ESTINIEN_000_208<tab>...Fine.
target: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ESTINIEN_000_208<tab>……了解だ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_209<tab>...Really? I thought you said you were avoiding “that Baldesion woman.”
target: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALPHINAUD_000_209<tab>……珍しいこともあるものだ、素直に同行してくれるなんて。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ESTINIEN_000_210<tab>If I refused, she would only pursue me.
target: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ESTINIEN_000_210<tab>今、いなくなると……消えちまいそうなんでな。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ESTINIEN_000_211<tab>Let's get this over with, shall we?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ESTINIEN_000_211なんでもないさ。
ほら、さっさと「石の家」に向かうぞ。

source:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALISAIE_000_240Amidst all the fighting, it's easy to forget what we've achieved, isn't it? I mean...we cured Tiamat. Tiamat, for heavens' sake!
...You will tell me if I become insufferably smug, won't you? Because the way things are going, it feels like a definite possibility.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_ALISAIE_000_240ティアマットという強大な存在まで治癒できたのは、
個人的に、大きな自信になったわ。
この調子で、さらにテンパードを……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_TATARU_000_250<tab>Well, it looks like I'm going to have a busy few moons─not that they ever seem to be anything but.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_TATARU_000_250)) (( )) 02 /var>さんも、本当にお疲れさまでっした……！
各地に現れたという「異形の蛮神」については、
私の方で、関係諸国と情報をやり取りしておりまっす。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_TATARU_000_251<tab>Thancred's got me dispatching troops to every corner of the realm. Which is not to say I don't trust the Alliance, because I do. But when it comes to putting down primals, nobody does it better than us.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_TATARU_000_251さっそく、ホーリー・ボルダーさん始め、
何人かの冒険者たちが、各国へ援軍として出立していきまっした。
異形の存在とはいえ、蛮神対策は「暁」の本分でっすから！

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_TATARU_000_252<tab>Well, than <var 1A 02 /var>you lot<var 1A 01 /var>, more accurately. You won't catch me trading blows with a primal in the near future. But for every fell fiend you vanquish, there's countless meals to arrange, baths to fill, sheets to wash, stores to replenish, and the list goes on.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_TATARU_000_252あと、サンクレッドさんに頼まれた、お風呂とお食事の用意も。
それにベッドメイクや、少ない資材の補充だって、
エフェミさんと終わらせておきまっした！

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_TATARU_000_253<tab>Which is where I come in. And gladly, mind you. It's the least I can do to support the Scions who risk life and limb─like poor Arenvald...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_TATARU_000_253……みなさんが、どれほどの危険に晒されているか、
私はよーく、よーくわかっておりまっす。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_TATARU_000_254<tab><sigh> I wish there was something we could do for him. But we'll just have to settle for saying the odd prayer and keeping a roof over our heads.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_TATARU_000_254アレンヴァルドさんの負傷についても……
戦える力がある分だけ、きっと私よりも悔しく思いながら、
進み続けてるんだと思いまっす。

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_TATARU_000_255<tab>It wouldn't do to have him come back to a complete shambles, now would it?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_TATARU_000_255その覚悟に対して、私にできるのは、
「暁の血盟」の活動を全力で支えることだけ……！
そして、みなさんの帰りを、笑顔でお待ちするのでっす！

source: TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_TATARU_000_256<tab>...But that's enough of my rambling. Off you go and get some rest. If there are any developments, I promise you'll be the first to know!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMK106_04063_TATARU_000_256でっすから、
)) (( )) 02 /var>さんも、今はどうか休息を。
状況に進展がありましたら、必ずお伝えしまっす！
